name: I Am the Fated Villain
author: Heavenly Villain
content: Immediately after Gu Changge realized he had transgressed into a fantasy world, the world&#039s protagonist, and fortune&#039s chosen, vowed to take revenge on him. Envied by all, not only is the female lead head over heels for him, but he&#039s also treated as a distinguished guest wherever he goes. Fortunately, Gu Changge&#039s prestige and power are superior to everyone else&#039s, so shouldn&#039t it be easy to trample on a mere fortune&#039s chosen?Hold on… There’s a system dedicated to mil
